nytimes.title: Brian Williams Suspended From NBC for 6 Months Without Pay
nytimes.topComment: Meanwhile Dick Cheney continues to go on the news and lie every chance he gets. But unlike Brian Williams, nobody ever trusted Dick Cheney anyway.

nytimes.title: Jon Stewart Will Leave ‘The Daily Show’ on a Career High Note
nytimes.topComment: How can we possibly make it through the 2016 presidential elections without Jon Stewart or Stephen Colbert? We NEED them!
